A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is hot garbage. It is a soulless and hollow shell\, and Disney does not care if it breaks so long as they can get to the money inside. In this sense\, it is more like a piggy bank than a movie. If you haven't seen it don't\, it will leave a bad taste in your mouth and taint your memories of the original trilogy. Episode 9 doesn't deserve a chance after this.
